thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Mr Brian Mc Grath
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mr Brian Mc Grath

author: Mr Brian Mc Grath
title: Mr Brian Mc Grath
text: Other Couriers always let me me know by email and text re time of delivery. I had no idea of the timing of my delivery which is unacceptable and most disappointing. My email to Customer Services enquiring as to time of delivery was also ignored. Overall a disappointing experience when compared to the professionalism and efficiency of a Company like Scottsdale.
